properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT, NVL((SELECT IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND IMG_LEVEL = 0), NULL) POST_IMAGE ,PROFILE_IMGE,MEMBER_NICK FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_TYPE_CD) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE PR_BOARD= ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N' ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC)A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6
